summary: Zweeti Fast Food Billing app ‚Äî a mobile-friendly fast food billing web app. The user has provided an updated CSS reference design with: gradient body background (linear-gradient 135deg #ff5722 to #ff9800), app container max-width 420px with #f5f5f5 background, orange #ff5722 header bar, white cards with border-radius 12px and box-shadow, table headers with #ffe0d6 background, buttons full-width with border-radius 8px (Print: #4caf50, PDF: #2196f3, Clear: #9e9e9e). User has also requested Invoice Number and Date fields. Save as PDF button calls window.print(). GST toggle checkbox (checked by default) toggles GST (5%) on/off. A login screen has been updated to use Firebase OTP phone authentication: phone input (+91XXXXXXXXXX), a recaptcha div, a Send OTP button, an OTP input, and a Verify button. Firebase Authentication integration is being added using Firebase JS SDK v9.23.0.
architectural_notes: Single-page HTML app with inline CSS and vanilla JS
Print bill hides buttons via @media print
Menu items updated per user reference: 13 items including Chaumin variants, Momos, Pasta, Rolls, and Burgers
Save as PDF button uses window.print() (printBill function), replacing the open-in-new-tab PDF approach
Date Wise Sales Report uses localStorage key format 'dailyTotal_YYYY-M-D' (non-zero-padded month/day) via getKeyFromDate()
GST is togglable via a checkbox (id='gstToggle'); when unchecked, GST is 0 and Grand Total equals Subtotal
Body uses gradient background (135deg #ff5722 to #ff9800); app container is max-width 420px with #f5f5f5 background; header bar is #ff5722; cards are white with border-radius 12px and box-shadow
Login state persisted in localStorage key 'zweetiUser'; auto-login on page load if key exists; logout clears key and reloads
Firebase JS SDK v9.23.0 loaded via CDN (firebase-app.js and firebase-auth.js from gstatic.com) for authentication
Login screen uses Firebase phone OTP authentication: RecaptchaVerifier on 'recaptcha' div, sendOTP() calls signInWithPhoneNumber, verifyOTP() confirms OTP code
